description: Try our easy to follow Hash Breakfast recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Potato cake,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Hash Breakfast Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat half the oil in a large skillet, add the onion and potatoes, and fry for 5-6 minutes or until the potatoes are golden and the onions are softened.
Stir in the corned beef and season well with pepper and Worcestershire sauce. Continue to fry for 2-3 minutes.
Meanwhile, heat the remaining oil in a skillet pan and fry the eggs.
Spoon the hash onto 4 serving plates, top each with a fried egg and serve sprinkled with the chopped parsley and a little smoked paprika.
